name: Splendid Labs, Inc
description: Developer of a mobile application designed to track and shop products. The company's mobile application automatically identifies and recognizes the products saved as screenshots in mobiles camera roll, enabling users to move those products into lists, keep track of sales and other deals and then finally buy when the price is right.
one_liner: Developer of a mobile application designed to track and shop products. The company's mobile application automatically identifies and recognizes the products saved as screenshots in mobiles camera roll, enabling users to move those products into lists, keep track of sales and other deals and then finally buy when the price is right.
